projectGridLines.title: B2B Product Support Intern (Customer Success Support Implementation Team)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Support customers for use of Eltropy’s AI powered Digital Conversations

platform.

Skill sets: Verbal and written communication, troubleshooting, data analysis, creating

charts and powerpoint presentations

Expected learning:

? Eltropy’s B2B Enterprise Digital Conversations Platform

? Knowledge of U.S. community financial institutions

? how to communicate with U.S. customers.

? How U.S. customers use Eltropy products and how they benefit

Specific courses required for project execution: Any engineering discipline.
